src.measure.preprocess module

src.measure.preprocess.channel_list(ID, embryos)[source]

helper function for src.scripts.quant.stepGroupDiff()

Returns

channels – ['img','imr'] or ['img'] depending on whether the red channel is LifeAct

Return type

list of str

src.measure.preprocess.read_outline(fname_outline)[source]

read outline of embryo

Returns

outline – whether each pixel is in embryo

Return type

np.array((X,Y),dtype=bool)

src.measure.preprocess.read_raw(savedir, dir_raw, ID, LabelR, tRes, nEnd)[source]

read raw imagestack

raw tif files are located in dir_raw, start with ID, and end with G or R.

refer to src.utils.decorators.return_dict() for how to use the decorator @return_dict

Parameters

  • savedir (list of str) – the directory to save the output as a dictionary

  • dir_raw (str) – directory of raw tif files

Returns

  • savedir (list of str) – same as input savedir

  • img (np.array((T,X,Y))) – cropped green channel image stack

  • imr (np.array((T,X,Y))) – cropped red channel image stack
